title: Team Competency Enhancement Training Based on CPR Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Foundational competency development program for students exploring careers in the medical field.

learning_goals: Learners can perform CPR with accurate compression depth and rate within 60 seconds
Learners can progress through simulation scenarios with an 80% completion rate by distributing team roles and demonstrating leadership
Learners identify three or more areas for improving team collaboration and develop action plans during debriefing sessions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
